RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Phd in Architecture at the Polytechnic of Turin (2013), developing the theme: InViTo - GeoVisualizzazione Interattiva a supporto dei Processi di Decisione Territoriale. He has a master's degree in Architecture - Politecnico di Torino (2008). He works as researcher at SiTI - Higher Institute on Territorial Systems for Innovation. He is a GIS consultant and web developer, but his main research expertise is focused in the field of geo-visualization, that is in the visual and interactive support to decision-making processes, planning and design, at various levels. Within SiTI he works on several European projects such as CODE24 Corridor 24 Development Rotterdam-Genoa and CircUse Circular Flow Land Use Management . He has a relevant international experience, grown also through his membership to several COST Actions concerning transport and urban development. He is the author of several national and international publications on books and journals.
Tendo em vista ser pesquisador estrangeiro, os dados atualizados das atividades do presente pesquisador se encontram em:
http://invito.urbanbox.it/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/2013-10_CV_Stefano_Pensa_EN.pdf
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Phd in Architecture at the Polytechnic of Turin (2013), developing the theme: InViTo - GeoVisualizzazione Interattiva a supporto dei Processi di Decisione Territoriale. He has a master's degree in Architecture - Politecnico di Torino (2008). He works as researcher at SiTI - Higher Institute on Territorial Systems for Innovation. He is a GIS consultant and web developer, but his main research expertise is focused in the field of geo-visualization, that is in the visual and interactive support to decision-making processes, planning and design, at various levels. Within SiTI he works on several European projects such as CODE24 Corridor 24 Development Rotterdam-Genoa and CircUse Circular Flow Land Use Management . He has a relevant international experience, grown also through his membership to several COST Actions concerning transport and urban development. He is the author of several national and international publications on books and journals.

http://invito.urbanbox.it/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/2013-10_CV_Stefano_Pensa_EN.pdf

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: GEO-VISUALIZER, GIS CONSULTANT and WEB DEVELOPER at Higher Institute on Territorial Systems for Innovation (SiTI), Politecnico di Torino and Compagnia di San Paolo, Torino, for the project: TPL - Analysis of regional public transport. Implementation of on-line query tool for the regional administration. http://siti-torino.hostei.com/test/tpl.html

INVITED MEMBER at COST TU0801 Cost TU0801 - Semantic enrichment of 3D city models for sustainable urban development Generative model for the analysis and project evaluation of the urban in the city of Skopje (MK). http://siti-torino.hostei.com/test/invito_cost_TU0801.html

MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE SUBSTITUTE in COST TU1002 Accessibility Instruments for Planning Practice. Analysis of urban public transport via Interactive Visualization Tool: interaction with open data for the exploration of accessibility in urban spaces.

GEO-VISUALIZER and TOOL DEVELOPER at Higher Institute on Territorial Systems for Innovation (SiTI), Politecnico di Torino and Compagnia di San Paolo, Torino, for the project: Interactive Visualization Tool (InViTo): a tool for supporting planning and decision-making processes. http://siti-torino.hostei.com/test/invito_torino.html
participation as TEACHING FELLOW at Master in World Heritage at Work , Course A974135, International Trading Centre of the ILO.
3D MODELER and GEO-VISUALIZER for the project Monforte d Alba , National research project managed by the Department of Inter-university Territorial Studies and Planning, Politecnico di Torino.

GIS CONSULTANT and GEO-VISUALIZER at Higher Institute on Territorial Systems for Innovation (SiTI), Politecnico di Torino and Compagnia di San Paolo, Torino, for the project: CoDe 24 Corridor 24 Development Rotterdam Genoa - project funded by Interreg IVB NWE. ACTION LEADER in WP1, Action 2: Railway and SETtlement development dynamic visualisation tool (R&SET Tool). Creation of an interactive visualization tool for the assessment of Corridor 24 projects. ACTION PARTNER in WP1: Collaborative assessment process and decision making tools for the corridor development. Planning pilot actions on informal planning procedure. http://siti-torino.hostei.com/test/invito_code24.html

GIS CONSULTANT and GEO-VISUALIZER at Higher Institute on Territorial Systems for Innovation (SiTI), Politecnico di Torino and Compagnia di San Paolo, Torino, for the project CircUse - Circular Flow Land Use Management project funded by Central Europe to analyze the reuse of brownfield sites. Construction of a sDSS to facilitate the planning process in Asti. http://siti-torino.hostei.com/test/invito_circuse.html
TEACHING FELLOW, II level course, Advanced Virtual Modeling and Rendering , Faculty of Architecture, Politecnico di Torino

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Istituto Superiore sui Sistemi Territoriali per l Innovazione

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: What for (a real case example): several public administrations need a tool to share and analyze a large data set of information on public transport. This comprises information on routes, ridership, economic data, demography, and others from different sources. People with different backgrounds should be able to work on the dataset according to their own focus. Data may be updated during the usage of the analysis tool. How: web interfaces based on maps and virtual globe applications. Javascript, html and php programming combined with most widespread API interacting with a Geo Data Base.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: What for (a real case example): several public administrations need a tool to share and analyze a large data set of information on public transport. This comprises information on routes, ridership, economic data, demography, and others from different sources. People with different backgrounds should be able to work on the dataset according to their own focus. Data may be updated during the usage of the analysis tool. How: web interfaces based on maps and virtual globe applications. Javascript, html and php programming combined with most widespread API interacting with a Geo Data Base.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: What for (a real case example): the participants to a planning exercise need to build a common language and knowledge about the issues to be discussed during meetings. Complex information e.g. on a city and its behavior - needs to be shared. How: Visual representations using vector and raster graphics. Production of cards and posters to support discussion in participatory processes or communicate outcomes of research and analysis.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: What for (a real case example): the participants to a planning exercise need to build a common language and knowledge about the issues to be discussed during meetings. Complex information e.g. on a city and its behavior - needs to be shared. How: Visual representations using vector and raster graphics. Production of cards and posters to support discussion in participatory processes or communicate outcomes of research and analysis.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: What for (many real cases): sets of data - some are geographic data or linked to locations - need to be analyzed and summarized on thematic maps. Use of results is either by specialists or the general public. How: combined use of GIS, db and spreadsheet software.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: What for (many real cases): sets of data - some are geographic data or linked to locations - need to be analyzed and summarized on thematic maps. Use of results is either by specialists or the general public. How: combined use of GIS, db and spreadsheet software.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: What for (a real case example): we need to see the unseen . What is the appeal of a location based on the perception of people? In a participatory planning exercise we ask people to characterize and rate what they value e.g. bus stops, parks, shops, schools. That information needs to be visualized and explored during the exercise so that participants see what they say . How: dynamic visualization to support participatory planning processes. Combined use of virtual globe, generative modeling systems, 3d visualization and GIS data.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: What for (a real case example): we need to see the unseen . What is the appeal of a location based on the perception of people? In a participatory planning exercise we ask people to characterize and rate what they value e.g. bus stops, parks, shops, schools. That information needs to be visualized and explored during the exercise so that participants see what they say . How: dynamic visualization to support participatory planning processes. Combined use of virtual globe, generative modeling systems, 3d visualization and GIS data.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: What for (a real case example): some information, perhaps also with a geographical reference, should be seen and understood in terms of facets of issues and their relationships. Examples are economic and environmental aspects of a topic -with their hierarchy- and the network of relationships among their fine features How: static or dynamic visualizations based on visual complexity . Colors and dimensions combined with techniques such as semantic fields are used to show invisible links
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: What for (a real case example): some information, perhaps also with a geographical reference, should be seen and understood in terms of facets of issues and their relationships. Examples are economic and environmental aspects of a topic -with their hierarchy- and the network of relationships among their fine features How: static or dynamic visualizations based on visual complexity . Colors and dimensions combined with techniques such as semantic fields are used to show invisible links

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: What for (a real case example): media to introduce workshop themes and promote activities How: video production, also including information from the methods illustrated above
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: What for (a real case example): media to introduce workshop themes and promote activities How: video production, also including information from the methods illustrated above

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: SiTI - Higher Institute on Territorial System for Innovation

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: InViTo - Interactive Visualization Tool -GeoVisualizzazione Interattiva a supporto dei Processi di Decisione Territoriale
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O software j foi testado em vrios projetos europeus consentindo recolher contribuies de peritos de outras nacionalidades e com competncias diferenciadas. um instrumento de suporte Anlise Espacial (SDSS Spatial Decision Support System) capaz de combinar dados georreferenciados, com verstil gama de visualizao multidimensional como ferramenta de apoio deciso, construda pela combinao do potencial dos dois softwares bastante difundidos ((Rhinocerons e o seu plug-in Grasshopper). Consente visualizar em tempo real os dados colocados durante o processo de discusso e tomada de deciso, a fim de se visualizar cenrios alternativos e facilitar de informaes, superando as dificuldades relacionadas a diversas competncias tcnicas dos responsveis pelas decises. Simula resultados em ambientes paramtricos e interativos e em terceira dimenso.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: TEACHING FELLOW, II level course, Urban Planning Technique , Faculty of Civil Engineering, Politecnico di Milano.
